name: ZxZ
description:
(This is a WASM4 GAMEJAM entry)

Quite unpolished scifi puzzle + against-the-clock videogame. If you enjoyed Chimera or Metaplex as a kid, you might find it fun. Otherwise... who knows.

Written on unknown to me architecture in 84h (with a few hours of sleep) it seems quite glitchy, but still you can play and finish the game, enjoy the music (otherwise the lever where you start the game turns the music off/on).
If your browser slows down, consider trying the very small self-contained binaries.

Kudos to aduros who invented wasm4, and to tjpalmer for organising the gamejam, that was fun! Going to bed now, hugs!
